title: A question about the flushdns fix

embed.description: Think of Domain Name System (aka DNS) as an address book for the internet. It tells your computer where to go when browsing or gaming online. Sometimes these settings can get borked causing lag in game and patching issues.. This video will show you how to properly configure these settings for League of Legends.

body:
I have been playing LoL on and off since season 2. Over the years I have experienced several bugs that affect the patcher/launcher and make logging in difficult. They are basically expected every 6 months-ish at this point. For the most part they are fixable with varying degrees of difficulty, and I feel like they mostly fix themselves on their own after a while. (I'm fairly patient when it comes to League's bugs).

Anyways, ill keep the rest short.

TL;DR I cannot connect to PVP after entering my username/password. I waited for the next patch to release. I repaired/reinstalled, followed the instructional video, tried other suggestions from people with the same issue. I DID have minor success following the "ipconfig  /release > ipconfig /renew > ipconfig /flushdns" method. But that only worked one time only and I got 1 day out of it.

The league forms are the last place I'm gonna check before I throw in the towel and call it a day with league.

If there are any other known fixes that I missed on youtube/google/reddit etc. please list them here.

This is the most annoying fucking thing league has thrown at me in like 3 years of playing.

Thank you.

replies.body:
I am also having difficulty reaching support page for riot games. After a few seconds of loading, my browser tells me that support.riotgames.com cannot be reached. I have separate browsers and none of them can connect to the site. 

If there are additional steps other than what has been mentioned in the video, please list them directly on this page. Thank you.

Issues connecting to PvP.net are generally caused by local network settings that conflict with League. You mentioned flushing your DNS settings worked once, so I recommend working through the rest of our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this problem.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
